per_frame_1=//treb_thresh=above(treb_att,treb_thresh)*2+
per_frame_2=//(1-above(treb_att,treb_thresh))*((treb_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_3=//mid_thresh=above(mid_att,mid_thresh)*2+
per_frame_4=//(1-above(mid_mid_att,mid_thresh))*((mid_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_5=//vol_thresh= (pfthresh+treb_thresh+mid_thresh)/3;
per_frame_6=//wave_r = 0.65 + 0.5*sin(time*1.13);
per_frame_7=//wave_g = 0.65 + 0.5*sin(time*1.23);
per_frame_8=//wave_b = 0.65 + 0.5*sin(time*1.33);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(1.6*time);
per_frame_11=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_12=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_13=warp = 0;
per_frame_14=pfthresh = above(bass_att,pfthresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,pfthresh))*((pfthresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_15=pfdx_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdx_r;
per_frame_16=pfdy_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdy_r;
per_frame_17=rg1 = abs(sin(time));
per_frame_18=rg2 = 0*above(rg1,0.75) + 3*below(rg1,0.25) + 1*above(rg1,0.25)*below(rg1,0.5)+
per_frame_19=2*above(rg1,0.5)*below(rg1,0.75);
per_frame_20=rg3 = if(equal(pfthresh,2),rg2,rg3);
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=q1 = wave_r;
per_frame_23=q2 = wave_g;
per_frame_24=q3 = wave_b;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=cog = ocog+0.005*(bass+bass_att+(bass*bass_att)-2);
per_frame_27=ocog = below(cog,30000)*cog;
per_frame_28=q4 = cog;
per_frame_29=
per_frame_30=rcog = orcog + 0.5*(rand(100)*0.01);
per_frame_31=orcog = below(rcog,20000)*rcog;
per_frame_32=q5 = rcog;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=tg1 = abs(sin(time));
per_pixel_5=tg2 = 12*dx_r*above(tg1,0.5) + 12*dy_r*below(tg1,0.5);
per_pixel_6=tg3 = if(equal(thresh,2),tg2,tg3);
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=zoom = zoom + abs(12*dx_r*(0.4*sin(6*time)-rad*(3*cos(5*q4))));
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_4=`
warp_5=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_6=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_7=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*7;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`    // darken over time
warp_10=`    //ret -= 0.004;
warp_11=`    //ret *= 0.99;
warp_12=`    //ret *= 0.97 + 0.03*saturate( length(uv - uv_orig)*200 );  // center only
warp_13=`    float dec = saturate(vol/vol_att - 1.1)*0.5 + 0.004;
warp_14=`    ret = frac(ret - dec);
warp_15=`}
